name: xernerx-example-bot
description: A javascript example bot for the xernerx framework.
author: Dummi

scripts.checks: npm i && npm audit fix --force && npm fund && npm link xernerx && nodemon
scripts.patch: git add . && git commit -m "Version Patch"  && npm version patch && git push
scripts.minor: git add . && git commit -m "Version Upgrade" && npm version minor && git push
scripts.major: git add . && git commit -m "Version Rewrite" && npm version major && git push
